name: Infinite Space (itch)
description:
This game was created specifically for the Move Only Right game jam. It took me about 8 hours so I really hope there are no major bugs. The concept is simple- you need to survive! There are currently 3 types of enemies and 3 different bonuses you can get from supply boxes. If you have any feedback feel free to leave a comment.

Controls:

W/S - move the player up and down

SPACE BAR - fire

GOOD LUCK!
